name: Shape of You (LifeisArt)
description:
A top down action/fighter where the results  show an art piece generated from each of your actions.  - A deconstruction of our freedom to act and its consequences.

Controls:

MoveMouse Cursor positionDashSHIFTBlinkEShoot QSlamSPACEBAR

Made by:
Sorapol Sroysuwan - Planner, Programmer
Rawissara Rattanawannukul - Programmer
Natnicha Changjarn - Programmer
Surapat Chokkij - Art Director, Artist
Pasu Chootai - Artist, Sound Designer

An "Art Games Jam" project from Bangkok, Thailand
www.goethe.de/artgames

#gr8artgames
